fullplot: Rich Hill intimately chronicles the turbulent lives of three boys living in an impoverished Midwestern town and the fragile family bonds that sustain them.
plot: Rich Hill intimately chronicles the turbulent lives of three boys living in an impoverished Midwestern town and the fragile family bonds that sustain them.
title: Rich Hill

tomatoes.consensus: As compassionate as it is infuriating, Rich Hill offers a sobering glimpse of American poverty.
